author: stahlleiton
body:
This PR includes the option to perform a boost in the MCSingleParticleFilters in order to apply a generator-level cut on the momenta of single particles in the laboratory frame, instead of the center of mass frame, in the case of boosted MC production (for proton-lead). This PR follows the same strategy as https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/16425

@kurtejung , @mandrenguyen
title: Allow a boost on particles in MCSingleParticle Filters
